quoteFirst: There is no “half-price for children,” and for the simple reason that such an arrangement would reduce the takings exactly fifty per cent.  They are _all_ children who support the gaff.  Costermonger boys and girls, from eight or
quoteLast: teen years old, and errand boys and girls employed at factories.  As before mentioned, every district has its own “gaff.
title: The seven curses of London

quoteFirst: At this time," says the colonel, "the place is not worth keeping, the country being so thoroughly impoverished and desolate;" and he accordingly, after viewing the marvels of the locality, pursued his way to Banda, and thence _laid a dâk_ (or travelled by palanquin with relays of bearers) to Calpee, "there to sit from
quoteLast: , writing filthy accounts of bricks and mortar, square feet, cubic feet, and running feet, rupees, annas, and pie; squabbling with wrinkled unromantic villains, whose cool-tempered and overwhelming patience amply deserve their unlawful gains--I mean as labourers in the vineyard of villany."
title: Blackwood's Edinburgh Magazine — Volume 55, No. 341, March, 1844

quoteFirst: She had nine battleships of 14,000 tons displacement each, built between 1895 and 1898--the _Magnificent, Majestic, Prince George, Jupiter, Cæsar, Mars, Illustrious, Hannibal_, and _Victorious_--with engines developing 12,000 horsepower that sent them through the water at 17.5 knots, protected with from
quoteLast: teen inches of armor, and prepared to inflict damage on an enemy with torpedoes shot from under and above the water, and with four 12-inch guns, twelve 6-inch guns, sixteen 3-inch guns, and twenty guns of smaller caliber but of quicker firing possibilities.

quoteFirst: This is a profound truth, but people will not recognise it. There is no more prosaic person than your bank clerk, who ladles out romance from
quoteLast: with a copper trowel without knowing it. There is no more prosaic building than your stone-faced banking office, which hums with romance all day, and never guesses what a palace of wonders it is.
